item.title: OCP4 UPI baremetal pxeless with static ips
item.description: Do you want to deploy an OCP4 cluster without using PXE and using static IPs? I’ve got you covered. See my unsupported step by step instructions on how to doing it, including: No PXE (pretty common scenario in big companies) Avoid installing stuff and use containers instead (instead yum/dnf install httpd, haproxy,… use containers) Use rootless containers if possible Use Fedora29/RHEL8 stuff (nmcli, firewalld, etc.) Enjoy!
